wikipedia_page.main: Russell Ian George (born 1974) is a Welsh Conservative Party politician who has been the Montgomeryshire Member of the Senedd (MS) since the 2011 election.

response: It is the first town on the River Severn (), counting from the source. The town's Member of Parliament is the Conservative Craig Williams  (MP since 2019) and its Member of the Senedd is Conservative Russell George (MS since 2011).
Beat Russell George 35 votes to 25 for re-election on 12 May 2021.
